Token.Abstract: <USBillboardDelegate> provides ability to control USBillboard presentation and react to related events.
A delegate method that must be implemented to see contents in the billboard.

Parameter.Name: aBillboard
Parameter.Abstract: A billboard requesting a presentation controller to stick its contents into view controllers hierarchy. The presenting view controller is expected to be the one that is currently presented on screen.

Token.Abstract: A delegate method that is called when the billboard is about to present its contents.

Parameter.Name: aBillboard
Parameter.Abstract: A billboard that is about to present its contents.

Token.Abstract: A delegate method that is called right after the billboard presents its contents.

Parameter.Name: aBillboard
Parameter.Abstract: A billboard who's content was presented.

Token.Abstract: A delegate method that is called when the billboard is about to dismiss its contents.

Parameter.Name: aBillboard
Parameter.Abstract: A billboard that is about to dismiss its contents.

Token.Abstract: A delegate method that is called right after the billboard dismisses its contents.

Parameter.Name: aBillboard
Parameter.Abstract: A billboard who's content was dismissed.

Token.Abstract: A delegate method that is called when a content presented in the billboard unlocks a reward.

Parameter.Name: aBillboard
Parameter.Abstract: A billboard that received a reward.

Parameter.Name: aReward
Parameter.Abstract: A reward object that is associated with the contents currently presented in the billboard.

Token.Abstract: A delegate method that is called when a content presented in the billboard initiates a purchase process, usually as a result of user interaction with the presented content.

Parameter.Name: aBillboard
Parameter.Abstract: A billboard that received a purchase.

Parameter.Name: aPurchase
Parameter.Abstract: A purchase object that is associated with the contents currently presented in the billboard.
